name: Bronze IBR Certified Globe Steam Stop Valve
subtitle: IBR Approved • High Temperature
description: IBR Certified bronze globe steam stop valve for high-temperature applications in boiler systems. Suitable for steam, water and oil service.

name: Cast Iron IBR Certified Globe Steam Stop Valve
subtitle: ASTM Grade • Flanged End
description: Heavy-duty cast iron globe valve with IBR certification for steam stop applications. Precision engineered for high pressure and temperature resistance.

name: Cast Steel IBR Certified Gate Valve Class 150#
subtitle: Class 150 • Bolted Bonnet
description: Cast steel gate valve with class 150 pressure rating for industrial pipelines. IBR approved for steam and boiler applications.

name: Cast Steel IBR Certified Gate Valve Class 300#
subtitle: Class 300 • High Pressure
description: High-pressure cast steel gate valve for critical industrial applications. Class 300 pressure rating with IBR certification.

name: Cast Steel IBR Certified Globe Valve Class 150#
subtitle: Class 150 • Steam Service
description: Globe valve for steam and high-temperature service. Class 150 pressure rating, bolted bonnet design with IBR approval.

name: Cast Steel IBR Certified Globe Valve Class 300#
subtitle: Class 300 • Bolted Bonnet
description: High-pressure cast steel globe valve with IBR certification. Class 300 pressure rating for demanding industrial service.

name: Forged Steel A-105 IBR Certified Gate Valve
subtitle: Forged A-105 • Socket Weld / Threaded
description: Forged steel A-105 gate valve for high-pressure applications. Available in socket weld and threaded end connections with IBR approval.

name: Forged Steel A-105 IBR Certified Globe Valve
subtitle: Forged A-105 • Threaded End
description: Forged steel A-105 globe valve with threaded connections. IBR certified for steam and high-pressure fluid service.

name: Forged Steel F-304 IBR Certified Check Valve
subtitle: SS 304 • Swing Type
description: Stainless steel 304 check valve with swing type design. IBR certified for steam service and corrosive fluid applications.

name: Forged Steel F-304 IBR Certified Gate Valve
subtitle: SS 304 • Flanged End
description: Stainless steel 304 gate valve for corrosive environments. IBR certified with flanged end connections.

name: Ball Valve Stainless Steel
subtitle: SS 304 / SS 316 • Full Bore
description: Full bore stainless steel ball valve for precise quarter-turn shut-off. Available in SS 304 and SS 316 material for corrosive media.

name: Butterfly Valve Wafer Type
subtitle: Wafer / Lug Type • CI / DI
description: Compact butterfly valve for large diameter pipelines. Suitable for water treatment, HVAC and chemical industries.

name: Safety Valve Spring Loaded
subtitle: Spring Loaded • IBR Certified
description: Spring-loaded safety valve for pressure relief in boilers, pressure vessels and pipelines. IBR certified for steam service.

name: Pressure Reducing Valve
subtitle: Direct Acting • Adjustable Setpoint
description: Maintains constant downstream pressure regardless of upstream fluctuations. Ideal for steam, water and compressed air systems.

name: MS Pipes and Fittings
subtitle: Mild Steel • ERW / Seamless
description: High-quality mild steel pipes for structural and industrial fluid applications. Available in ERW and seamless variants as per IS standards.

name: SS Pipes and Fittings
subtitle: SS 304 / SS 316 / SS 321
description: Premium stainless steel pipes and fittings for pharmaceutical, food processing and chemical industries.

name: GI Pipes and Fittings
subtitle: Galvanized Iron • ISI Certified IS 1239
description: ISI certified galvanized iron pipes and fittings for water supply, fire fighting and general purpose applications.

name: IBR Pipes and Fittings
subtitle: IBR Certified • IS 1239 / IS 3589
description: Indian Boiler Regulation approved pipes and fittings for steam and boiler applications. Manufactured as per IS standards with IBR test certification.

name: Flanges
subtitle: Slip-On / Weld Neck / Blind • ANSI / IS
description: Industrial flanges in slip-on, weld neck, blind and socket weld types. Available in various pressure classes as per ANSI and IS standards.

name: Pipe Fittings
subtitle: Elbow / Tee / Reducer • Butt Weld
description: Complete range of butt weld and socket weld pipe fittings including elbows, tees, reducers and caps as per ANSI B16.9.

name: Strainer Y-Type
subtitle: Y-Type / Basket Type • Flanged
description: Industrial pipeline strainer for removing solid particles from liquids and gases. Available in Y-type and basket type configurations.

name: Temperature and Pressure Gauges
subtitle: Dial Type • SS Bourdon Tube
description: Industrial temperature and pressure gauges for accurate measurement in process industries. SS Bourdon tube with glycerine filled dial.
